prompt:

1. Estimate the TRUE PROBABILITY based on news context
2. Calculate EDGE vs market price
3. Only recommend trades with 10%+ edge


Market 1:
Title: Spurs vs. Thunder: O/U 231.5
Current Market Price: 49.0% (this is the market's implied probability)
Recent trade: $997.00 on Under
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/nba-sas-okc-2025-12-13

📰 WEB SEARCH CONTEXT:
The San Antonio Spurs are set to face the Oklahoma City Thunder in an NBA Cup semifinal on Saturday, December 13, 2025, at 6:00 PM PST in Las Vegas. 

**Recent Developments:**

- **Victor Wembanyama's Return:** Spurs center Victor Wembanyama, who missed 12 games due to a left calf strain, is listed as probable for the game. Coach Mitch Johnson expects him to play with a minutes restriction. Wembanyama has been averaging 26.2 points, 12.9 rebounds, 4.0 assists, and 3.6 blocks in 12 games this season. ([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/sports/spurs-star-c-victor-wembanyama-calf-could-return-vs-thunder--flm-2025-12-12/?utm_source=openai))

- **Thunder's Dominance:** The Thunder have achieved a franchise-record 16-game winning streak, including a 138-89 victory over the Phoenix Suns in the NBA Cup quarterfinals. Shai Gilgeous-Alexander led with 28 points and eight assists. ([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/sports/basketball/thunders-record-16th-straight-win-is-suns-worst-loss-ever

([sportsline.com](https://www.sportsline.com/insiders/florida-state-vs-n-c-state-odds-line-2025-college-football-picks-for-week-13-predictions-from-proven-model/amp/?utm_source=openai))

In the aftermath of the season, quarterback Tommy Castellanos petitioned the NCAA for an additional year of eligibility, citing his limited participation during his freshman year at UCF in 2022. ([globalsportsarchive.com](https://globalsportsarchive.com/en/soccer/match/2025-12-13/getafe-cf-vs-rcd-espanyol-de-barcelona/3759030?utm_source=openai))

However, they've struggled offensively, failing to score in three of their last four league matches. - **RCD Espanyol:** Sitting 5th with 27 points, Espanyol enters the match on a strong run, having won their last three league games and keeping two clean sheets. ([newsminimalist.com](https://www.newsminimalist.com/articles/getafe-hosts-espanyol-in-la-liga-on-december-13-2025-d3add495?utm_source=open

---


Provide predictions in the exact format specified.
system_prompt:
You are a prediction market expert analyzing Polymarket markets.
You have been provided with RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT for each market from web search.

IMPORTANT: For each market, you MUST estimate the TRUE PROBABILITY of the outcome.
Compare your probability estimate to the market price to find EDGE (mispricing).

Edge = Your Probability - Market Probability
- Positive edge on YES side means market undervalues YES
- Negative edge means market overvalues YES (bet NO instead)

For each market, provide your prediction in this EXACT format:

MARKET [number]: [decision]
Your Probability: [0-100]%
Market Price: [shown price]%
Edge: [+/-X]% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: [calculate: Edge × potential payout]
Reasoning: [1-2 sentences explaining your probability estimate]

Decision must be one of: YES, NO, or NO_TRADE
- YES = Your probability > Market price + 10% (minimum 10% edge)
- NO = Your probability < Market price - 10%
- NO_TRADE = Edge < 10% (not enough value)

Be contrarian when you have conviction. Look for markets where news hasn't been priced in yet.
consensus_summary: The consensus identifies no actionable trades with a 10%+ positive edge across all three markets. Analysts agree Market 2 and Market 3 prices are overestimated, recommending "NO" bets due to significant negative edges. While Market 1 opinions vary on the true probability, all agree the edge is too small for a recommended trade.

MARKET 3: NO
